dshb-settings.h2: Adjust your profile, security, notifications, and more.
dshb-settings.imageRequirementDescription: PNG or JPG no bigger than 800px wide and tall.
dshb-settings.closeAccountWarning: Warning: If you close your account, you will lose all your data, and will lose access forever.
dshb-settings.notificationsTitle: Notifications - Choose when and how to be notified
dshb-settings.selectPushEmail: Select push and email notifications you'd like to receive.
dshb-settings.chooseNotificationPreference: Choose when and how to be notified
dshb-settings.notifyClubs: Notify me about activity from the clubs I'm enrolled in
dshb-settings.notifyRecommendedClubs: Notify me about recommended clubs for me
dshb-settings.notifyGrades: Notify me about the grades and house points i'm assigned
dshb-settings.notifyConnemts: Notify me about activity on comments i wrote
dshb-settings.emailAboutCurriculum: Send me emails about the curriculum and updates related to me.
dshb-settings.emailAboutChallenges: Send me emails about training challenges I can enroll in.
dshb-settings.emailAboutNews: Send me emails about important news and events for the school.
dshb-settings.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
dshb-settings.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
